cast.overview: A raw and emotionally revealing look at one of the most iconic artists of our time during a transformational period in her life as she learns to embrace her role not only as a songwriter and performer, but as a woman harnessing the full power of her voice.
cast.title: Miss Americana

details.biography: Bobby Berk is an award winning designer from Los Angeles, California.  His designs have been seen i various media outlets such as HGTV, Bravo, CBS, Elle Decor, Dwell, and Domino.  In 2017, Bobby won both the gold and silver the award for "Best Interior Designer" from the National Association of Home Builders, in addition to taking home the award for Design from Houzz.  Currently Bobby is a member of the "Fab 5" on Queer Eye's Netflix reboot, as well as a regular contributor at US Weekly.
details.name: Bobby Berk
